Quest.name: Get Liz to leave James alone

Rule.name: intent-remove status: liz is heartbroken
Rule.description: The intent of this quest is to help Liz lose the heartbroken status.

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: James asks the player to get Liz to ligthen up and get over him.

Rule.name: Quest completed as requested raise trust

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Quest completed as requested. Liz is no longer heartbroken.

Rule.name: Asked to lose heartbroken dated player as well. Lower trust and buddy

Instantiation.name: Asked to remove heartbroken dated her as well

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: James is angry at the player for taking advantage of Liz and dating her.

Rule.name: Asked to help liz ended up getting them back together. James is very happy

Instantiation.name: Asked to help liz ended up getting them back together

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: James is quite happy that the player convinced him to get back together with Liz.

Rule.name: Colonel is neither friends nor enemies with James

Rule.name: Quest completed as requested raise trust and friendship

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: James is so happy with the player for healing that rift.

Rule.name: Colonel and James are enemies James is mad

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: James is mad that the player for making the Colonel dislike James so much.

Rule.name: James gets Colonel's diary instead James is confused

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: James takes the diary and ends up quite confused over the rantings.

Quest.name: Get Violet to like the Colonel more

LineOfDialogue.initiatorLine: Colonel is angry at the player because Violet is now enemies with him.
